pr_title: Add the maximum upper bound to the number of polls in listener of Email Connector

timeline.message: Add the maximum upper bound to the number of polls in listener of Email Connector

timeline.bodyText: what is the use of setting noOfPolls from the user perspective?
timeline.author: daneshk

replies.bodyText: Is it possible to call the listener stop() function if we need to stop the polling.
replies.author: daneshk

replies.bodyText: Suppose the user wants to handle the error path when there are no emails arriving within a certain time period, he can set that time period as pollingInterval * noOfPolls.
replies.author: Maninda

replies.bodyText: Yes he can use thestop() function too but with this new field it can automatically exit the listening task like a timeout.
replies.author: Maninda
